parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: True to override an existing value, false to not (see Remarks )

title: ISheetMetalGaugeTableParameters.SetRadius
description: Sets the bend radius in this gauge table.
signature:
System.Boolean SetRadius( 
   System.Double
Radius
,
   System.Boolean
Override
)

parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: True to override an existing value, false to not (see Remarks )

returns: True if bend radius successfully set, false if not
remarks:
If Override is:
true, then specify an override bend radius in Radius.
false, then specify Radius using one of the default bend radii for the current gauge number from the gauge table. Use
ISheetMetalGaugeTableParameters::GetAvailableRadii
to choose a value for Radius.
